name: Wuthering Waves: In the Turquoise Moonglow
storyline: The Moon-Chasing Festival is a Huanglong traditional festival that features various origin stories, with the most popular being the tale of The Fox and the Moon. On this special night, families and friends come together to admire the moon and make wishes, expressing their hopes for a brighter future.
summary:
Version 1.2 of Wuthering Waves, which included:
• New characters: Zhezhi and Xiangli Yao
• New main event: By Moon's Grace
• New companion story for Zhezhi: True Colors
• New echoes, events and more!
